alert.note: Alert for Grundy; Will (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Chicago (Northeastern Illinois and Northwestern Indiana)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 15 at 1:44PM CST by NWS Chicago
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING FOR AN ICE JAM IN EFFECT UNTIL 145 PM CST MONDAY... * WHAT...Flooding caused by an ice jam is occurring. * WHERE...A portion of northeast Illinois, including the following counties, Grundy and Will. * WHEN...Until Further Notice. * IMPACTS...Roadways, yards, and parks along the river are expected to flood. Due to the very heavy ice conditions, additional flooding may occur along the river in the warned area. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 140 PM CST, emergency management reported an ice jam near Phelan Acres and Bardwell Island. Flooding is ongoing and is expected to continue until further notice. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Phelan Acres, Wilmington and Lakewood Shores. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: A Flood Warning means flooding is imminent or may already be occurring. Persons along rivers, creeks, and other waterways should take immediate precautions to protect life and property.
